title: WRONGFULLY BANNED
body:
I got accused of inting on my account, but it was actually a combo of a horrible game and my fps dropping to 2-3 the whole game. Also I was building off meta, but I believe I cannot be banned for this. Is there any way to uplift this ban? It was the orianna game
 NA: Swonkytiger

replies.body: At about 24 minutes in you sold all of your ap items for a ruunaan's hurricane and rageblade on Orianna and then died about 8 more times before the match was over. This looks highly suspect.
Also least damage dealt, even less than the enemy supp.
Definitely not trolling and inting when you go 0/17/2 and start selling your ap items for attack speed at 24min.
bad game man what can i say :/
Damn the community called you out for your bullshit so fast....
Nope, as Zezockary said, you sold all your AP items at the 24 minutes mark & started troll-building with that Runaan build & even Mobi boots. No need to even pretend. You deserved the punishment.
